subject: p17770657
Findings: Comparison is made with prior study. Cardiomediastinal contours are unchanged. Fluid in the right fissure has resolved. There is no pneumothorax or pleural effusion. The lungs are hyperinflated consistent with emphysema. Left lower lobe atelectasis is grossly unchanged. Right lower lobe opacities have increased consistent with worsening pneumonia. Multiple medistinal surgical clips are unchanged. Anterior mediastinal tubes are in unchanged position.
